alert.note: Alert for Dickey; La Moure; Logan; McIntosh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 2:10PM CST until January 08 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SUNDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Dickey, La Moure, Logan and McIntosh Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until Noon CST Sunday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing snow. Near blizzard conditions are possible at times in open country. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 15 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
